name: Level 22: Gary’s Misadventure - 2016 Edition
description: The first stealth game set in the merciless and frenetic world of work!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: NOTE: This game requires a controller as the keyboard/mouse controls are poorly optimised for this game.  With that said. It's alright. You get a couple of hours of fairly decent game. It's perhaps a little easy, at least I found, but hunting the collectables are fun. Good luck figuring out the safe combinations though, because some I NEVER EVER would have worked out as they are so obscure.  I also had an issue with the game loading on my secondary monitor and it was impossible to move it. It has no options for graphic settings.  It doesn't deserve a thumbs down, at least from me as I didn't  dislike  playing it. Play it if you want, you're not missing anything really if you don't though.
